name: 4th and Goal
description:
The favorite free desktop football game is mobile! Make Big Hits, score touchdowns, and choose plays created by current, and former high school, college, and pro football players! Remember, no punts...it's 4th and Goal.

Just like our computer version, we plan to continually update 4th and Goal with new plays and features. The desktop version has been played millions of times, and we aim to make this just as fun. Now, pick your team and dominate!

Tip: On defense, if you use the hit button to tackle the ball carrier, you might cause a fumble!
